about_the_game:
Step into a charming village where your entrepreneurial journey begins! Grow crops and tend to your farm animals, collecting fresh produce and valuable goods to sell at your bustling market. Expand your farm with greenhouses, workshops, and decorative touches to make it uniquely yours.

Build strong relationships with the villagers to unlock access to new and better supplies, upgrade stands with help from the friendly lumberjack, and hire workers to streamline your operations. Raise livestock and transform raw materials into sought-after products.

Farming

Buy seeds, grow products, and sell them in your market. Expand your farm or greenhouse to cultivate every season.

Workshop

Cut meats, bake fresh items, or ferment drinks using the drink machine, with recipes available for each tool to help you get started.

Livestock

Buy cows, goats, and chickens to raise in your barn. Feed them daily, and they will provide produce such as milk and eggs.
detailed_description:
Step into a charming village where your entrepreneurial journey begins! Grow crops and tend to your farm animals, collecting fresh produce and valuable goods to sell at your bustling market. Expand your farm with greenhouses, workshops, and decorative touches to make it uniquely yours.

Build strong relationships with the villagers to unlock access to new and better supplies, upgrade stands with help from the friendly lumberjack, and hire workers to streamline your operations. Raise livestock and transform raw materials into sought-after products.

Farming

Buy seeds, grow products, and sell them in your market. Expand your farm or greenhouse to cultivate every season.

Workshop

Cut meats, bake fresh items, or ferment drinks using the drink machine, with recipes available for each tool to help you get started.

Livestock

Buy cows, goats, and chickens to raise in your barn. Feed them daily, and they will provide produce such as milk and eggs.
name: Ranch Store Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher (64-bit)
  • Processor: 2.4 Ghz Dual Core CPU
  • Graphics: 2 GB Dedicated Memory
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Immerse yourself in Ranch Store Simulator, where you care for adorable animals, grow fresh vegetables, and manage your own store! Feed, water, and harvest to keep your farm thriving. Sell your goods, attract customers, and expand your business in this cozy, fun-filled farming adventure.
